Oscar's statuette awarded to a producer of "The King's Speech"...
...has been badly damaged when a toddler dropped it at a party.
15-month-old Lara Egan was holding the Academy Award when this happened.
The Oscar ended up with several dents and some of the gold plating was chipped off.
But luckily, Academy bosses are forgiving.
A lovely lady came out with gloves on,...
...took our award away and came back and it was all repaired within 15 minutes.
The crew's forgiven little Lara but will be much more careful with the Oscar in the future.
